bs-responsibleeditors-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of responsible editors extension
prefs-responsibleeditors:
Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], headline for responsible editors section in preferences. 
{{Identical|Responsible editor}}
bs-responsibleeditors-pref-activatedname: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text for enabled namespaces:
bs-responsibleeditors-pref-autoassignona: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for automatically assign on page creation
bs-responsibleeditors-pref-emailnotifica: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for notify on responsibility change
bs-responsibleeditors-pref-responsibleed: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for add pages to responsible editors' watchlists
bs-responsibleeditors-pref-echange: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for notify when page has been changed
bs-responsibleeditors-pref-edelete: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for notify when page has been deleted
bs-responsibleeditors-pref-emove: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label text for notify when page has been moved
bs-responsibleeditors-pref-autopermissio: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text for automatic assignment of rights:
bs-responsibleeditors-error-ajax-not-all: Text for access denied. You are not authorized to perform this action.
bs-responsibleeditors-statebartop-icon-a: Image alternativ text for there is a responsible editor for this page
bs-responsibleeditors-statebarbody-headl:
Headline for responsible editors section. Parameters:
*$1 - the number of responsible editors - use for PLURAL distinction
*$2 - username of the responsible editor - use for GENDER distinction
{{Identical|Responsible editor}}
bs-responsibleeditors-error-specialpage-: Text for the given page does not exist.
bs-responsibleeditors-mail-subject-new-e:
Mail subject for responsibility for "$1" assigned. Parameters:
* $1 - the page which got assigned
bs-responsibleeditors-mail-text-new-edit:
Mail text for $2 {{GENDER:$1|assigned}} you to "$3". After logging into the wiki you can open the page with this link: $4. If you have any questions please refer to $2. 
* $1 is the username of the user which made the assignment - use for GENDER distinction, 
* $2 is the real name of the user which made the assignment, 
* $3 is the page which got assigned, 
* $4 is the link URL of the page
bs-responsibleeditors-mail-subject-forme:
Mail subject for responsibility for "$1" revoked 
* $1 is the page which got revoked
bs-responsibleeditors-mail-text-former-e:
Mail text for $2 {{GENDER:$1|revoked}} the responsibility for the page "$3". The new {{PLURAL:$5|responsible editor is|responsible editors are}}: $4. After logging into the wiki you can open the page with this link: $6. If you have any questions please refer to $2. 
 $1 is the username of the user which made the revoking - use for GENDER distinction, $2 is the real name of the user which made the revoking, $3 is the page which got revoked, $4 are the new responsible editors in comma separated list, $5 the number of new respsonible editors use for PLURAL distinction, $6 is the link URL of the page
bs-responsibleeditors-mail-subject-re-ar:
Mail subject for the page "$1" has been {{GENDER:$2|edited}} by $3 
* $1 is the page which has been edited,
* $2 is the username of the user which made the edit - use for GENDER distinction,
* $3 is the real name of the user which made the edit
bs-responsibleeditors-mail-text-re-artic:
Mail text for the page "$1" for which you are assigned as a responsible editor has been {{GENDER:$2|edited}} by $3. After logging into the wiki you can open the page with this link: $4 
* $1 is the page which has been edited, 
* $2 is the username of the user which made the edit - use for GENDER distinction, 
* $3 is the real name of the user which made the edit, 
* $4 is the URL of the edited page
bs-responsibleeditors-mail-subject-re-ar:
Mail subject for the page "$1" has been {{GENDER:$2|deleted}} by $3 
* $1 is the page which has been deleted,
* $2 is the username of the user which made the deletion - use for GENDER distinction, 
* $3 is the real name of the user which made the deletion
bs-responsibleeditors-mail-text-re-artic:
Mail text for the page "$1" for which you are assigned as a responsible editor has been {{GENDER:$2|deleted}} by $3. After logging into the wiki you can open the page with this link: $4 
* $1 is the page which has been deleted, 
* $2 is the username of the user which made the deletion - use for GENDER distinction,
* $3 is the real name of the user which made the deletion,
* $4 is the URL of the deleted page
bs-responsibleeditors-mail-subject-re-ar:
Mail subject the page "$1" has been {{GENDER:$2|moved}} by $3 
* $1 is the page which has been moved, 
* $2 is the username of the user which moved the page - use for GENDER distinction,
* $3 is the real name of the user which moved the page
bs-responsibleeditors-mail-text-re-artic:
Mail text for the page "$1" for which you are assigned as a responsible editor has been {{GENDER:$3|moved}} to "$2" by $4. After logging into the wiki you can open the page with this link: $5 
* $1 is the old page which has been moved,
* $2 is the new page which the old page got moved to,
* $3 is the username of the user which moved the page - use for GENDER distinction,
* $4 is the real name of the user which moved the page,
* $5 is the URL of the new page after moving
responsibleeditors:
Special page name for responsible editors
{{Identical|Responsible editor}}
bs-responsibleeditors-no-own-responsibil: Text for there are no pages which you are the responsible editor for.
bs-responsibleeditors-yourresponsibiliti: Text for list of pages which you are responsible for.
bs-responsibleeditors-title:
Window title for responsible editors 
{{Identical|Responsible editor}}
bs-responsibleeditors-titleeditors:
Window title for responsible editors 
{{Identical|Responsible editor}}
bs-responsibleeditors-cmchangerespeditor: Lable text for change responsible editors
bs-responsibleeditors-columnresponsiblee:
Column headline for responsible editors 
{{Identical|Responsible editor}}
bs-responsibleeditors-rbdisplaymodeonlya: Option on special page for show only pages with responsibility already assigned
bs-responsibleeditors-rbdisplaymodeonlyn: Option on special page for show only pages without assigned responsibility
bs-responsibleeditors-rbdisplaymodeall: Option on special page for show all pages
log-name-bs-responsible-editors: Used in [[Special:Log]], label for responsible editors log
log-description-bs-responsible-editors: Used in [[Special:Log]], log description for editors responsible for pages.
logentry-bs-responsible-editors-add:
Log message about adding a new editor to a page.
Parameters:
* $4 - name of the editor
logentry-bs-responsible-editors-remove:
Log message about removing an editor from a page.
Parameters:
* $4 - name of the editor
echo-category-title-bs-responsible-edito: Label for action messages, used in [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-echo]]
Label for assignment messages, used in [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-echo]]
notification-bs-responsibleeditors-assig:
Notification about assigning a user as editor to a page - flyout/archive page
Parameters:
* $1 - username of the assigner
* $2 - name of page (unused)
* $3 - link to page

Notification about assigning a user as editor to a page - email subject
Parameters:
* $1 - username of the assigner (unused)
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page (unused)

Notification about assigning a user as editor to a page - email body
Parameters:
* $1 - username of the assigner
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page
notification-bs-responsibleeditors-revok:
Notification about removing a user as editor from a page - flyout/archive page
Parameters:
* $1 - username of the remover
* $2 - name of page (unused)
* $3 - link to page

Notification about removing a user as editor from a page - email subject
Parameters:
* $1 - username of the remover (unused)
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page (unused)

Notification about removing a user as editor from a page - email body
Parameters:
* $1 - username of the remover
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page
notification-bs-responsibleeditors-chang:
Notification about user editing a page - flyout/archive page
Parameters:
* $1 - username of the author
* $2 - name of page (unused)
* $3 - link to page

Notification about user editing a page - email subject
Parameters:
* $1 - username of the author
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page (unused)

Notification about user editing a page - email body
Parameters:
* $1 - username of the author
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page
notification-bs-responsibleeditors-delet:
Notification about user deleting a page - flyout/archive page
Parameters:
* $1 - username of the author
* $2 - name of page (unused)
* $3 - link to page

Notification about user deleting a page - email subject
Parameters:
* $1 - username of the author
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page (unused)

Notification about user deleting a page - email body
* $1 - username of the author
* $2 - name of page
* $3 - link to page
notification-bs-responsibleeditors-move-:
Notification about user moving a page - flyout/archive page
Parameters:
* $1 - username of the author
* $2 - name of original page (unused)
* $3 - link to original page
* $4 - name of new page (unused)
* $5 - link to new page

Notification about user moving a page - email subject
Parameters:
* $1 - username of the author
* $2 - name of original page
* $3 - link to original page (unused)
* $4 - name of new page (unused)
* $5 - link to new page (unused)

Notification about user moving a page - email body
* $1 - username of the author
* $1 - username of the author
* $2 - name of original page
* $3 - link to original page
* $4 - name of new page
* $5 - link to new page
bs-responsibleeditors-pagestorefilter-as:
Column list filter label in ExtJS grid on special page for show pages with responsibility already assigned
{{Identical|Assigned}}
bs-responsibleeditors-pagestorefilter-no: Column list filter label in ExtJS grid on special page for show pages without assigned responsibility

apihelp-bs-bs-responsibleeditors-tasks: Describes the API endpoint that allows manipulation of responsible editors
apihelp-bs-responsibleeditorsposibleedit: Describes the API endpoint that lists possible responsible editors
Describes the <var>articleId</var> parameter of the API module
apihelp-bs-responsibleeditorspages-store: Describes the API endpoint that lists pages for the manager component of responsible editors
apihelp-bs-responsibleeditorspossibleedi: Describes the API endpoint that lists possible responsible editors
apihelp-bs-responsibleeditorsactivenames: Describes the API endpoint that lists namespaces that responsible editors is activated in
apihelp-bs-responsibleeditors-tasks-desc: Describes the API endpoint that allows manipulation of responsible editors
